# desktop-hide

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                               | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `hidetablet` | `hidetablet` | In addition to hiding all children content in screens desktop + bigger, this will hide content in screens tablet + bigger | `boolean` | `false` |
